about.heroSubtitle: Where we bring the sea and adventure to you
about.storyParagraph1: At Coral & Shells Center, our passion for the sea runs deep. We believe in the thrill of adventure and the joy of discovery, and we're dedicated to helping you explore the magical underwater world.
about.storyParagraph2: Whether you're taking your first breath underwater or are a seasoned pro, we have everything you need. Our center offers a wide range of courses designed to take you from a beginner to a certified diver.
about.storyParagraph3: Join us as we dive into the wonders of the marine world and explore its beauty and help protect its treasures for generations to come.
about.promiseDescription: We promise you a world-class experience that goes beyond the ordinary. We are committed to being the leading diving center in Saudi Arabia by providing exceptional training, education, and services. We'll equip you with top-quality gear and empower you with the skills to dive confidently and safely. Our goal is to build a passionate community dedicated to exploring and conserving our incredible marine environment.
about.whyChooseDescription: At Corals and Shells Center, we believe the sea holds a universe of wonders, and we're here to help you explore it.
about.whyChooseClosing: We provide a welcoming and supportive environment where you can learn and grow at your own pace. Our certified instructors and top-quality gear ensure that you receive the best training and a safe experience. Join us, and discover why we are the trusted choice for those ready to explore the sea's treasures.

about.valueGoalDescription: We help you achieve your diving goals, from beginner to professional.
about.valueInnovativeDescription: Modern teaching methods and latest diving techniques and equipment.

faq.heroSubtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our diving courses, trips, and services
faq.noResults: No questions found matching your search

general.a1: Coral & Shells is a professional diving center based in the Eastern Province of Saudi Arabia. We offer diving courses, adventure trips, equipment, and community initiatives for all experience levels.
general.q2: Do I need prior experience to join?
general.a2: Not at all! We welcome complete beginners. Our courses are designed to take you from zero experience to a confident, certified diver. We also offer programs for experienced divers looking to advance their skills.
general.q3: What age groups do you cater to?
general.a3: We offer programs for all ages. We have specialized kids' swimming programs starting from age 6, as well as adult courses and family-friendly diving trips.

courses.a1: We offer PADI-certified courses including Open Water Diver, Advanced Open Water, Rescue Diver, and various specialty courses. We also offer swimming school programs and freediving certifications.
courses.q2: How long does it take to get certified?
courses.a2: The PADI Open Water Diver course typically takes 3-5 days. This includes classroom sessions, confined water practice, and open water dives. Advanced courses vary in duration depending on the specialty.
courses.a3: Our courses include all necessary training materials, equipment rental during training, pool and open water sessions, and the international certification upon successful completion.

trips.q1: Where do your diving trips go?
trips.a1: We organize trips to various locations including the Arabian Gulf, Red Sea, and other exciting dive sites across the region. Each trip offers unique underwater experiences and marine life encounters.
trips.q2: What is included in a diving trip?
trips.a2: Our trips typically include transportation, diving equipment, guide services, meals during the trip, and insurance. Specific inclusions vary by trip â€” check each trip's details page for the full breakdown.
trips.q3: Do I need certification for trips?
trips.a3: Some trips require diving certification while others are open to all levels. Each trip listing clearly indicates whether certification is required. We also offer discover scuba experiences for non-certified divers on select trips.

equipment.q1: Do I need to bring my own equipment?
equipment.a1: No, we provide all necessary equipment for our courses and trips. However, if you have your own gear, you're welcome to bring it. We also sell quality diving equipment through our shop.
equipment.a2: We carry top diving brands including Cressi, Mares, and other industry-leading manufacturers. All our equipment is regularly maintained and meets international safety standards.
equipment.a3: Yes, we offer equipment rental for certified divers who want to dive independently. Contact us for rental rates and availability.

booking.q1: How do I book a course or trip?
booking.a1: You can book directly through our website by selecting any course or trip and clicking the 'Book Now' button. You can also contact us via WhatsApp or email to make a booking.
booking.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
booking.a2: We accept bank transfers, cash payments at our center, and major credit/debit cards. Payment details are provided upon booking confirmation.
booking.a3: Cancellations made more than 48 hours before the scheduled activity are eligible for a full refund. Cancellations within 48 hours may be subject to a cancellation fee. Please contact us for specific details.

safety.q1: What safety measures do you have?
safety.a1: Safety is our top priority. All our instructors are certified and experienced. We maintain our equipment to the highest standards, follow international diving protocols, and carry comprehensive insurance for all activities.
safety.q2: Do I need medical clearance to dive?
safety.a2: All participants are required to complete a medical questionnaire before diving. Some medical conditions may require a doctor's clearance. We recommend consulting with your physician if you have any health concerns.
safety.q3: What happens in case of an emergency?
safety.a3: Our team is trained in emergency response and first aid. We carry emergency oxygen and first aid equipment on all trips. We also have established protocols with local emergency services and DAN (Divers Alert Network).

faq.contactDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is happy to help.
